title: Abbasi pays tribute to forces for successful operation in Mohmad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP): Federal Minister for Railways Muhammad Hanif Abbasi on Wednesday paid rich tribute to the Pakistan army for its successful operation in Mohmand, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
The minister commended the timely and effective action of the security forces, which led to the identification and neutralization of 30 elements associated with the outlawed group “Khawarij.”
He lauded the courage and professionalism demonstrated by the brave soldiers during the operation, saying that “our valiant forces have once again proven their unmatched skill and unwavering resolve in defending the nation.”
Abbasi reaffirmed that Pakistan will never compromise on its sovereignty and integrity. He said the swift and decisive action of the Pakistan army has significantly strengthened national security.
“The entire nation takes great pride in the courage and dedication of its gallant soldiers,” the minister added.
